name: PitProRite Blackjack Trainer v2
description: An interactive AI-powered training tool for aspiring Blackjack dealers. This application presents realistic game scenarios generated by Gemini, allowing trainees to practice payouts and procedures while receiving instant feedback and performance tracking.
